# Marvin Rhone - Software Engineer

## About
Marvin Rhone is a software engineer based in Seattle, WA. Economics degree from Brown University, self-taught programmer with 12+ years building software. Currently focused on AI-augmented development workflows and developer tooling.

## Contact
- Website: https://intelligence.marvin.technology
- GitHub: https://github.com/cornerbodega
- Resume: https://intelligence.marvin.technology/resume.pdf

## Open Source Claude Tools

### xquery
Natural language database queries for PostgreSQL via Claude.
- GitHub: https://github.com/cornerbodega/xquery
- Features: Multi-database support, multi-statement queries, automatic backups before DELETEs, CLI client
- Stack: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Claude API

### Reporter
LaTeX to PDF conversion API.
- GitHub: https://github.com/cornerbodega/reporter
- Features: Syntax highlighting, logo insertion, auto-cleanup of temp files
- Stack: Node.js, Express, pdflatex

## Projects

### Motosai - Multiplayer Motorcycle MMO
Browser-based multiplayer motorcycle game built in 5 weeks.
- Live: https://motosai.com
- Devlog: https://motosai.com/devlog
- Features: Realistic counter-steering physics, real-time WebSocket multiplayer at 60fps, dynamic traffic AI, comic book aesthetic
- Stack: Three.js, Socket.io, Google Cloud Run
- 20,000+ lines of code

### Gunsmoke4 - AI Video Generation Pipeline
Transforms courtroom transcripts into cinematic videos using AI.
- Features: SadTalker for lip-sync, Flux Pro/Midjourney for character portraits, RunPod GPU for rendering
- Cost: 94% cheaper than commercial video APIs ($18-29 vs $330-720 for a 12-hour video)
- Currently processing: Scopes Monkey Trial (1925)
- Stack: Node.js, SadTalker, RunPod, FFmpeg, OpenAI TTS

### Gunsmoke3 - 3D Courtroom Simulation
Real-time 3D courtroom scenes in the browser.
- GitHub: https://github.com/cornerbodega/Gunsmoke3
- Features: GPT-4 for transcript parsing, lip-sync via viseme + amplitude analysis
- Stack: Next.js, React Three Fiber, WebGL, Supabase
- 129 commits over 3 months

### Marvinfo (Intelligence.Marvin.Technology)
AI-powered research wiki - save and organize AI outputs into shareable, interlinked reports.
- Live: https://intelligence.marvin.technology
- Features: Choose-your-own-adventure Wikipedia experience, agents that learn over time, text-to-speech, image generation
- Stack: Next.js, Supabase, OpenAI API, Google Cloud Run

### Hedge Fund Hero
iOS stock analysis game using AI.
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hedge-fund-hero/id6605920631
- Features: Retrieval Augmented Generation for fundamental analysis of S&P 500 stocks
- Stack: iOS, Swift, Supabase, Node.js

### RhymeWith.Us
Multiplayer browser rhyming game.
- Live: https://rhymewith.us
- Features: 3D graphics with Three.js, global leaderboard, NLP algorithm for rhyme detection
- Stack: Three.js, Node.js

## Work Experience

### Staff Engineer (Contractor) - Foresight Data
- Built xquery: system to query 20+ AWS PostgreSQL databases with natural language via Claude
- Built Reporter: LaTeX to PDF API for professional report generation
- Top ticket closer on the team

### Senior Software Engineer - Cookies
- Reduced costs by $1M+ annually
- Built custom Node.js API with DatoCMS replacing Salsify and Tray.io
- Dynamic CMS-powered website cutting campaign launch times

### Founder - ABC Traceability
- Built and sold SaaS platform for Washington State cannabis compliance
- Self-taught full-stack development
- Advocated for open API policies at conferences

### Associate - BlackRock
- Managed analytics for $14T+ in assets on Aladdin platform
- Automated performance attribution and compliance reporting

## Education
- Brown University - Economics
- Stanford/DeepLearning.AI - Machine Learning Specialization

## Skills
- Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Swift, SQL
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Three.js, React Three Fiber
- Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Supabase

- Tools: FFmpeg, LaTeX, Git
